item.title: About Me

  • Infrastructure as Code

Current Focus

I’m currently expanding my skills in full-stack web development, with a particular interest in high-performance, scalable systems.

item.title: K3s Homelab Cluster
item.description:
A 6-node K3s cluster managed with GitOps principles using ArgoCD.

Architecture

  • 3 control plane nodes (also running etcd)
  • 3 worker nodes
  • Traefik ingress controller
  • ArgoCD for GitOps deployment
  • ELK stack for observability

Technologies Used

  • Kubernetes (K3s)
  • Ansible for automation
  • Kustomize for configuration
  • ArgoCD for continuous deployment
